field.label: Host
field.helpText: Enter the hostname or IP address of the MongoDB server.

field.label: Port
field.helpText: Enter the port of the MongoDB server.

field.label: Authentication Database
field.helpText: When adding a user, you create the user in a specific database. This database is the authentication database for the user.

field.label: Mongo+SRV
field.helpText: Used to identify if we are using mongo+srv connection string.

field.label: Connection String
field.helpText: The Connection String describes the hosts to be used and options.The format of the Connection String is: mongodb://[username:password@]host1[:port1][,host2[:port2],...[,hostN[:portN]]][/[database.collection][?options]] mongodb:// is a required prefix to identify that this is a string in the standard connection format.

field.label: Username/Client Principal
field.helpText: Provide the username of the user. Username is known as client principal in case of Kerberos Authentication.

field.label: Password
field.helpText: Enter the password of the user.

field.label: Replica Set Members
field.helpText: Enter replica set members as comma-separated values. Replica sets provide redundancy and high availability.

field.label: Authentication Type
field.helpText: Different authentication mechanisms that clients can use to verify their identity.

field.label: User Certificate
field.helpText: A certificate which includes fields specifying the subject used for issuing CA, and other required information such as the certificateï¿½s version and validity period which can be used to for X.509 authentication.

field.label: CA Certificate
field.helpText: A digital certificate issued by CA which certifies the ownership of a public key by the named subject of the certificate. A self-signed CA certificate can also be used.

field.label: Use SSL
field.helpText: Used for establishing an encrypted link between a server and a client. Can be used for any of the selected Authentication Type.

field.label: KDC Name
field.helpText: Provide KDC Name. Required for Kerberos Authentication.

field.label: Realm Name
field.helpText: Provide Realm Name. Required for Kerberos Authentication.

field.label: Krb5 Config Path
field.helpText: Provide Krb5.conf file path of the local directory. Required for Kerberos Authentication.

field.label: JAAS Config Path
field.helpText: Provide gss-jaas.conf file path of the local directory. Required for Kerberos Authentication.

field.label: Structured Data
field.helpText: On selection of this check box, a json schema will be created else no json schema is created. In order to create a json schema, please provide the ID.

field.label: Id
field.helpText: This id is the ObjectId of any record in the MongoDB. Based on the provided id, a json schema will be generated which will be used as request/response profile for a particular operation.

field.label: Datatype
field.helpText: This is the datatype of any record in MongoDB. Based on the provided datatype, a json schema will be generated which will be used as request/response profile for a particular operation.

field.label: Structured Data
field.helpText: On selection of this check box, a json schema will be created else no json schema is created. In order to create a json schema, please provide the ID.

field.label: Id
field.helpText: This id is the ObjectId of any record in the MongoDB. Based on the provided id, a json schema will be generated which will be used as request/response profile for a particular operation.

field.label: Datatype
field.helpText: This is the datatype of any record in MongoDB. Based on the provided datatype, a json schema will be generated which will be used as request/response profile for a particular operation.

field.label: Batch Size
field.helpText: The number of documents to be returned in each batch(default 1)

field.label: Structured Data
field.helpText: On selection of this check box, a json schema will be created else no json schema is created. In order to create a json schema, please provide the ID.

field.label: Include Size Exceeded Payload
field.helpText: On selection of this check box, input documents that were filtered based on size will be included in output.
